item.title: Learning Portfolio: Deeper dive into optimal transport
item.description: A quick google search indicates that optimal transport is more than just a linear programming problem about moving resources, and has many far reaching applications https://kantorovich.org/post/ot_intro/ This basic problem has a wealth of applications within mathematics (in the theory of partial differential equations, geometry, functional analysis, optimization, probability and so on) as well as in other fields (image processing, data science, economics, chemical physics etc.) and is currently an extremely active research area in both theory and applications.
